TEXT.TITLE: PRINCIPAL NEO-TECH SELLS UNIT
TEXT.BODY: <Principal Neo-Tech Inc> said it completed the sale of its subsidiary, Neo-Tech Inc, to Seismic Holdings Inc and Energy Holdings Inc, of Denver, Colo. As part of the price, Principal Neo-Tech received notes and preferred shares of Energy Holdings. However, terms were not disclosed. Reuter
